title: Abaiko Disk Space Monitor- MARSDENTECH
description:
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
|MARSDENTECH Presents: Abaiko Disk Space Monitor|
 -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Description
-=-=-=-=-=-=

Abaiko Disk Space Monitor is specifically used to monitor and control disk space and provide reliable notification of disk
space levels. Using this program you can hardly be taken by surprise with the information, that you run out of space!
The tool is intended for both regular home users and system administrators who need space for quickly growing logs of
various systems, enlarging databases, data backups, or for software caching data

Additional Details
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Features:


* Easy to use and configure
* Running at Windows startup
* Monitoring disks of any types
* Access to the application via the tray icon
* Warnings as balloon messages
* Email notifications
* Disable Windows warning messages

System Requirements:

Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/2003/Vista

Website: <a href="
http://www.diskspacemonitor.com/order.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.diskspacemonitor.com/order.html</a>

Price:

$19.95

Installation Details
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

To install, run Setup.exe, then run Activate.exe to activate.
